item.title: PowerBi and API â€“ Visualising my Checkins
item.description:
For my own amusement and also to show my wife where I have been I use the Swarm check-in app on my phone and check-in to places. Also for my own amusement I used PowerBi to visualise the data via theÂ APIÂ and allow me to filter it in various ways.

Whilst at the PowerShell Conference in Asia I was showing the mobile app to a group over some food and saying how easy it was and June Blender,Â the mother of PowerShell help,Â said that I ought to blog about it. So I have ðŸ™‚
